info.name: Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Foreign Trade of Vietnam
info.description: Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Foreign Trade of Vietnam, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services in Vietnam. The company accepts short, medium, and long-term deposits from organizations and individuals; trade of gold bars; and engages in financial and office leasing, and money remittance activities. It also provides account services; digital banking services; payment, corporate, and credit cards; consumer, home, auto, and business loans; and investment and savings insurance. In addition, the company offers money payment services; cash flow management services, such as account services, cash flow management, international payment, and transfer money; SME loans, such as credit by industry, short, medium, and long-term loans; guarantee services; foreign exchange and capital market services, such as forex trading, interest rate derivatives, and commodity price derivatives; digital banking; supply chain solutions; and consulting and investment services. The company was formerly known as Bank for Foreign trade of Vietnam. Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Foreign Trade of Vietnam was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
